original_title: Nebraska announces plan for immigration detention center dubbed the ‘Cornhusker Clink’ in McCook | CNN
article_summary: Nebraska to establish an immigration detention center, dubbed the "Cornhusker Clink," to house individuals awaiting deportation. The facility, located in McCook, will accommodate 200 people with plans to expand to 300. The move is part of the Trump administration's efforts to expand detention infrastructure for increasing deportations.</s>
